Detailed Description

class. Polygon desc. A regular n-sided polygon.

void Gorilla::Polygon::no_background (  )  [inline]

function. no_background desc. Don't draw the background. note. This just sets the background colour alpha to zero. Which on the next draw tells Rectangle to skip over drawing the background.

Definition at line 2210 of file Gorilla.h.

void Gorilla::Polygon::no_border (  )  [inline]

function. no_border desc. Don't draw the border. note. This just sets the border to zero. Which on the next draw tells Rectangle to skip over drawing the border.
